title: Villa LYLA - Private Villa 10 min Walk to Beach
summary:
Lyla COCOON Nelayan Villa offers an exclusive and relaxing escape in the vibrant heart of Canggu. Our villa is just 5 min to the beach, world-class surf spots, and and walking distance to Bali's best restaurants and cafes, providing the perfect blend of relaxation and adventure. The villa is thoughtfully designed with modern amenities,  for your convenience. Enjoy high-speed WiFi (up to 100mbps), daily cleaning service, and on-site security every night, ensuring a seamless and worry-free stay.

The space
TRANQUILITY, BEACHES & BALINESE CULTURE  
For those seeking a peaceful retreat away from the busy tourist hubs, yet still close to the excitement, this place is ideal for you. Nestled in a quiet neighborhood just inland from Canggu’s Nelayan, our property is only a 5 minutes away to the beach, offering a perfect blend of serenity and accessibility. 

THE POOL & GARDEN  
Relax and recharge in our refreshing plunge pool, set amidst a lush tropical garden. It’s the perfect spot to unwind and enjoy the peaceful atmosphere.

THE BEDROOM & BATHROOM  
The bedroom features a custom-made king-size bed (1.8x2m) with direct access to the plunge pool and stunning views of the garden. 

The bathroom, accessible through a sliding door beside the wardrobe, boasts a beige herringbone floor and a terrazzo shower overlooking a private tropical garden. The sink area is enhanced by a marble backsplash and illuminated by modern pendant lights, with a backlit mirror to brighten your mornings.

THE KITCHEN & DINING  
The fully equipped kitchen includes everything you need (microwave, dishwasher, and more) to prepare delicious meals. Whether cooking a quiet dinner for two or preparing breakfast, you’ll have all the essentials.

THE LIVING ROOM  
Our living room offers a cozy custom-made sofa, perfect for lounging. A smart TV is provided so you can log into your favorite streaming accounts, making it a great space to relax and catch up on your Netflix series.

THE TERRACE & LOUNGE AREA  
Soak up the sun on the terrace, featuring two stylish sun loungers, ideal for working on your tan or relaxing in the warm Bali breeze. In the evening, it’s the perfect spot for stargazing and enjoying the tranquil night sky.

We follow Airbnb's five-step cleaning process, ensuring a safe and sparkling environment for all our guests. This process was developed in partnership with leading experts to guarantee cleanliness and comfort throughout your stay.

Guest access
During your stay, you’ll have the entire villa to yourself. Enjoy complete privacy and make yourself at home — whether you’re relaxing by the pool, lounging in the living spaces, or making use of the modern amenities. This is your exclusive escape to unwind and enjoy everything Canggu has to offer!

Other things to note
Nestled in the tranquil Nelayan area, our villa is just 5 minutes away to the beach, world-class surf spots, and and walking distance to Bali's best restaurants and cafes, providing the perfect blend of relaxation and adventure. The villa is thoughtfully designed with modern amenities, including a fully equipped kitchen with a water dispenser, microwave, fridge, and dishwasher, plus a dedicated laundry room with a washing machine for your convenience. Enjoy high-speed WiFi (up to 100mbps), daily cleaning service, and on-site security every night, ensuring a seamless and worry-free stay. Experience the ultimate Bali getaway at Lyla COCOON Nelayan Villa, where comfort meets luxury in a stunning setting.
